title: Riot come on..
body:
Im trying to make a picture here but this replay system totally stinks.  Screening (of which I have addressed and has not been completely resolved) is messing with the stupid audio, and a lot of times the screen just blinks black for no reason -.-
FIX IT PLZ

replies.body:
Since your video is glitching out as well as your audio, there's a good chance that this is being caused by some kind of weird driver or software error. The title doesn't suggest it, but let's try the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure we hit some of the common causes of this. 

Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help at all!
